pages.content: Ancient symbols found throughout the Deep Dark

§oWhere do these artifacts come from? Who created them, and why did they choose you?§r

The answers lie scattered across the world, waiting to be discovered...

Some say the trinkets were forged in the End, by beings older than the Ender Dragon itself. Others whisper of a connection to the Deep Dark...

§8More will be revealed as you bond with your trinkets.§r
